评论详情: Gifted these to my son for Christmas. Upon removing them from the plastic bag they shipped in, we noticed the fabric felt like it had been through the washing machine and the tag had been cut out of the inside. They were not listed as vintage or previously worn, but they clearly were used.
The belt loops broke almost instantly they were poorly sown and one broke as soon as I put them one

评论概述: Jeans are not as described and can’t get a refund!
评论详情: Ordered these for my son in sept and they never came in. So I reordered in October and they came in with no back pockets, looking more like women jeans. Sent them back. Then today, Dec 18th I get them in the mail. Guessing it’s the first pr? Can’t find a way to send them back and still haven’t got refunded from second pr I sent back. Ugh!!!

I am a conventional mom with a particular style for me teen boy. I was reticent at first but the fit is just perfect. He is 5.4" 140 pounds and the length and with are just perfect. I even got a second one.

评论概述: Used jeans with broken snap and tags cut out
评论详情: These jeans were used clearly because the tag was cut out by someone they were worn looking and the snap was broken. I am very upset at receiving a used piece of clothing and will make a formal complaint about this since it wasn’t advertised as used clothing and it was for my grandson.
